description: A [team membership](https://v2.developer.pagerduty.com/v2/page/api-reference#!/Teams/put_teams_id_users_user_id) manages memberships within a team.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Role.description: The role of the user in the team. One of `observer`, `responder`, or `manager`. Defaults to `observer`.

TeamId.description:
The ID of the team in which the user will belong.
* `role`    - (Optional) The role of the user in the team. One of `observer`, `responder`, or `manager`. Defaults to `observer`.

UserId.description:
The ID of the user to add to the team.
* `team_id` - (Required) The ID of the team in which the user will belong.
* `role`    - (Optional) The role of the user in the team. One of `observer`, `responder`, or `manager`. Defaults to `observer`.
